body: Weirdly the previous chapters have better translation than this one, excessive Japanese words are cringe to read, why don't the translation words being used in the text bubbles instead?

Public Park nhentai.net/g/310339/ and Photography Event nhentai.net/g/308105/ could also possibly have happened before this chapter.

Who's Mei(the girl giving piggyback)? The first chapter seems to be https://nhentai.net/g/289275/ Try dressing up as a “little girl”! and this seems like the 2nd but it feels like a chapter where Kanna and Mei met is missing.
